start.text: We'll make them an offer they can't refuse. Heheheh!
They won't trade with us, they won't even talk to us. Eh, we'll have to destroy' em.
Twenty bars of Latinum to the Dai-Mon who destroys that flagship!

retreat.text: This isn't looking very profitable, we shouldn't be here.

need_help.text: This isn't going well, I need some help.
Five bars of Latinum to the Dai-Mon who stops this ship from shooting at me!

hull_90.text: I guess it's too late to hail them.

hull_50.text: The hull is damaged, this is gonna cost a fortune to repair.

hull_30.text: Structural failure! Get the Latinum to the life pods!
This isn't what they promised it would be like...

overload.text: Systems overloaded! We need to buy better equipment.
Energy spike! Everythings down, we're gonna die!

victory.text: Victory! Our new strategy is working!
